item.title: Use SSH keys for authentication
item.description: Set up your first SSH keys Use SSH keys for authentication without password when you are connecting to your server. simple and secure login process. To Generate a new SSH Key [root@server ~]$ ssh-keygen Generating public/private rsa key pair. Enter file in which to save the key (/root/.ssh/id_rsa): Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): Enter same passphrase again: Your identification has been saved in /root/.ssh/id_rsa. Your public key has been saved in /root/.
